Omotu Bissong (onye amụrụ Cecilia Ohumotu Bissong ) bụ onye ihe nlere anya ndi Naijiria, onye nlere onyonyo, na onye na eme ihe ejije, a kacha mara ya dika Funke Lawal na ndi Desperate Housewives Africa
Ọ bụ nwa afọ Yala, Cross River State
Bissong malitere ọrụ nlere anya ya mgbe ọ bụ nwata
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Nigerian Navy Primary school na Nigerian Navy Secondary school, ha abụọ di na obodo Navy [Navy Town, Lagos], nke ikpeazụ ka ọ gụsịrị mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ
O mechara debanye aha ya dịka nwa akwụkwọ nke Mahadum Calabar ebe ọ gụrụ Economics

Na 2003, Bissong - dika e si akpọ ya mgbe ahụ ka Celia Bissong - mere ihe akụkọ site na ịbụ onye mbụ nwetara akara Nwanyị Kachasị Mma na Naijiria siri na South-South (Ọ bụ ezie na Regina Askia nwere aha ahụ na afọ 1989, mana ọnwetachaghi mmeri ahụ n'ezie)
Ihe ikpo okwu ya bụ ime ka amara maka ọria HIV/AIDS, na nkwalite njem nleta Tourism, ma ọchichi ya buru ya ga asọmpi na Miss Universe na Miss World
Bissong rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ihe nlere na Nigeria tupu ọ kwaga America, ebe ọ debanyere aha ya na ụlọ ọrụ ihe atụ ọzọ ka ọ na-agụ Accounting na City University of New York

Na ajụjụ ọnụ nke ndi The Vanguard na 2008, Bissong katọrọ ịkpa oke megide ndị ojii na arụ ọlụ ihe nlele na ụlọ ọrụ ejiji America, ma kwetakwa na ọ na-echebiri asọmpi siri ike.[Tinye edensibịa] Mgbe ọ laghachitere Naịjirịa, ọ mepere ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ihe nlere iji wee weghachite ọkachamara na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Kemgbe ọ laghachiri na obodo ya na 2009, Bissong arụola ọrụ na telivishọn, na-egosi The Peak Talent Hunt Show,  na Africa Awakes na DSTV

Dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Bissong nọ na ihe nkiri Ghanaian  bụ Be My Guest yana Nadia Buari na Chris Attoh,  ọ nọkwa ugbu a sonyekwara ejije nke Africa nke Desperate Housewives dị ka nne nọ n'ụlọ na Funke Lawal nke dabere na Lynette Scavo na usoro mbụ
